channel.title: Talk Less Think More
channel.description: Recent content on Talk Less Think More

item.title: 2022 年记
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 2023年元旦，身上还披着厨房围裙，坐在工作了三年的小办公室里，听着Ed Sheeran，已经准备好写年记了，只是不太确定可以写什么。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 不惑之年有悟
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 多数人到了不惑之年应该都是各种看透看穿，智慧满满了吧。我还是欠缺不少火候，各种“商”大概还是停留在弱冠到水平。不过活到老学到老，比起年轻的自己有进步，应该就是件值得庆幸的事了。最近有些小感悟，记录一下
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 2021 年记
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 2022年3月，尘埃渐渐落定后，我终于可以坐下来写写过去的一年发生了什么。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: Zephyr Memory Slab Design
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: I have been always interested in zero cost abstraction designs and data structures. Recently I just found another great example while checking the Zephyr project: the memory slabs.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: A Short Journey With Macros
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
Playing with embedded systems for quite a few years, I have gained special love for arrays, enums, structs and, macros.
These are basic data structures and language features when used properly, would offer great readability, space/time efficiency
and, pleasure. A lot of the time with these simple tools one can construct zero-cost abstraction, which still facinates me every now and then.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 2020 年记
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
2020终于也过去了。
过去得有点稀里糊涂。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: Amba for Dummies Amba 3 Deep Dive APB
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: Well I am not sure how deep this Deep Dive is, but I will ensure you for a dummy book this chapter will be deep enough. Timing Diagram Legends It is very likely the next material you will read after this one is an AMBA spec, where you will see some timing diagram conventions like below and it will be helpful to understand now what they actually mean. Well clock is straightforward and you don’t need to be a hardware guy to understand what it means: a high and a low means one clock cycle. The rising/falling edge might trigger some operations in the hardware that driven by this clock (a.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: Amba for Dummies : Preface
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: I don’t know about you, but I am, at least at the time of writing, a so-called firmware engineer who knows a little bit of C/C++/Python/Rust, who struggles with keeping some vague and superficial, out-of-date and sometimes incorrect understanding about the hardware platform that runs my code.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: Amba for Dummies : Intro
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: This is a new personal project of mine. I build this dummy book with my personal notes when learning AMBA.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: Software Engineering v.s Workwooking
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: This year I become a 13-year software engineer and a 5-year woodworker (no, the latter is not certified). And now I believe there are reasons why I love writing code and making wood dust: they are so much alike!
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 2019 年记
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 2019年最后一个晚上，趴在我自己的床上，用Android版的Notion，写下这篇年记。这已经说明和往年有挺大的不一样了吧。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 2018年记
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
一年就这样过去了。

新年前夜外面有人点烟火放炮仗，早上起来看新闻说州府照例吊巨型土豆跨年，然后还有很多人Google那个土豆是不是真的。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 2017 年记
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 2017年12月底，家里除了我所有人都已经睡着了，客厅里圣诞树的灯还亮着。把冰箱里女儿没喝完的牛奶干完，我想起是时候记录一下即将逝去的这一年了。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 2016过期年记
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
这个时候再来写去年的年记，是有很多晚……

基本上已经不记得去年发生了具体的事情。为了年记系列的连续性，却还是要硬生生挤些出来的。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: A Custom Made Bluetooth Mechanical Keyboard
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 窗外头皮似的雪下了有一阵子了，门前水泥地上的斑斑积雪还只是像牛皮癣病人的皮肤一样，没有一脚踩一个深坑的气势。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: A Journey of Making Customized Keyboard
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: After I switched from QWERTY to Colemak, getting a keyboard for this new layout becomes something I’ve been thinking about more often. At the moment I was using HHKB and a Filco TKL, which are both nice keyboards, but it bothers me that the keyboards stay in QWERTY while I have already moved on.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: From QWERTY to Colemak
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: Eventually I made the move.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: LinkedIn, the False Land
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: Possibly for anyone you ask what is the best known social network for job and talent hunting, LinkedIn would be the answer. I used to be an active LinkedIn user, not any more. Because LinkedIn has become a False Land, where people lie often.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 拥抱“争吵”
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
自从年初总结了自己最大的缺点后，我就不时在想：如何才能做到善于发现问题呢？

用了半年大时间，我想我找到了两个方法：一是不要急着应对；二是去拥抱“争吵”。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: Three Software Engineer Levels
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: Recently I have been working with a wide range of software engineers on a new project. The experience with various engineers inspires me that there could be at least 3 levels of software engineers, when looking at what they are actually talking to.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 关于人的两种类型
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 记得有一种说法：人可以分成两类，一类人通过社交获取能量，另一类人通过独处获取能量。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 女儿诞生
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 经过274天的准备，我们的女儿选择在2015年的母亲节出生。出世后啼哭了三声她便安静下来，睁开双眼观察这个陌生又熟悉的世界。随后她还是那样安静，趴在妈妈的身上，好奇的看着麻醉药失效后缝合伤口的妈妈痛苦的呻吟。一直到护士给她注射防疫针，她才哇的一声大哭起来：欢迎来到残酷的现实世界。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 日本邻居
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 小区最近搬来了一家人，爸爸是玻利维亚人，妈妈是日本人，还有一个1岁小女孩，十足日本娃娃相，很是可爱。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: Migrate To Nikola
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
After about one year since I put on the only post in 2014, eventually I write a new one: the summary of the year (so
shame for this only one…)

And then I realize Octopress, after upgrading to the latest version, doesn’t work for my repo any more…Because I know
nothing about Ruby, this becomes absolutely a heart attack.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
2014年的总结是在2015年元旦很久后，加班的间隙写的。

回头一看事实上这一年什么都没写，这篇算是名副其实的年记了。

2013的时候感叹好多变化，2014更是让我应接不暇。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
过去的一年感觉就像一个月，呼的一下，就没了。

去年说最大的事就是肉身翻墙。墙外的第一年则是各种重新开始。结交新的朋友，融入新的生活，开始新的工作，尝试新的事物，开拓新的世界。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 铜婚
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
有一个词，“不知不觉”，在七年之后形容铜婚纪念日应该算是比较贴切的。

至少对我们是这样。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: What to Debug when You Are Debugging
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: Debugging is probably the first task for most of us in practice: Day 1 when you joined the team, someone senior called you to his desk and gave you a defect description, “go and figure out what goes wrong, young boy”.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: About Smart Watches
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: Tablets, smart phones, smart watches…
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: Repeat in Vim
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: There are many ways to repeat something in Vim. Knowing how and when to repeat would greatly save your time with Vim.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: Minimal Setup for Remote Access Linux from Windows with X
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: When accessing a Linux machine remotely in Windows, many might use VNC or similar remote desktop tools. Some might simply use Putty. Both are not quite satisfying: VNC and the like ask for too much network bandwidth when transferring graphical data, while Putty doesn’t support X and limits your use to only in the console.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 在开始总结过去的一年前，手悬在键盘上估摸着有5分钟的时间：很多事不知从哪个开始——是否说明去年过得很混乱？还是非常充实？
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 铁婚•铁与锈
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 与婚后第六年比起来，过去的纸 布 皮 丝 木就像是小孩子过家家。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 秋游日本归来
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 十一月，我们去了一趟日本玩。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 开关
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 晚上吃完饭，我在沙发上抱着电脑看视频，老婆背对着我上网也玩得起劲。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: Hello Octopress
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: This weekend I decided to migrate this blog from Wordpress to Octopress, because of many reasons searchable in google, and because with Octopress now I can write posts anywhere with Vim and Git. To help those who are now exploring Octopress (and myself sometime later), I’ve made some notes on the obstacles that I’ve seen as well as the solutions:
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: God Might Be a Supercomputer
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: This will be a very unique article in the blog: it tries to depict my imagination of God that comes to me when I was coding.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: The Not-So-Easy C
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
Whenever I get an embedded software engineer’s resume, one thing I can guarantee is there will be definitely a line says:

Excellent in C/C++ (or something similar)
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 外婆
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 对外婆的记忆大多是在放暑假的时候。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: Twitter Enabled Printer
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
Printers are old ugly monsters from the last century.
Twitter is about 6 years old and might shop for school pretty soon.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 11年记
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 面对即将来临的而立之年，过去的2011很是紧凑忙碌。日后回忆自己的29岁，想必一定要有意思得多：总结写到现在，唯独这一年，没有遗憾。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: Keep Your Fingers Away from "ESC"
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: When editing in Vim the keys that I hate most are “ESC” (Esc, Shift and CapsLock). They interrupt my thoughts when I have to find the keys far, far away from the comfort area of my fingers, not to mention the mistypes like pressing tab when I mean CapsLock.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 木婚•五年
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
一、二、三、四、五。相识七年，婚后五年。
这一年我们经历了最激烈的争吵，这一年我们感受到更暖人的温情。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: An Improved Version of the Counting Sort Implementation
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 程序员老二
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 老二在他前家很算挺大的公司写了10年程序，最后离开，到了一个学院教书，讲嵌入式设计。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: Encryption and Decryption - Note of Fundamental Number Theory III
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: In previous notes we’ve seen how messages are encrypted/decrypted from the top and middle level. Eventually we come to the very detail about how the helper functions in setRSAKeys(), and processMessage() are implemented.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: Encryption and Decryption - Note of Fundamental Number Theory II
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: The first thing we need to do in the main function is to prepare two groups of keys.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: Encryption and Decryption - Note of Fundamental Number Theory I
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
Reading the number theory has taken me a while.
And I guess, possibly, the most useful application of number theories is information encryption/decryption and digital signatures.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 老二洗碗
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 老二吃饭后总是第一时间洗干净碗筷。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 一零年记
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 自第一次给自己写年记已经是第七年，中国人有说法“七”是一个带来转变的数字。好像是这样的。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 老二的诗
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
老二是我的学长，以往暑假的时候都会借他用过的书来预习下一年的课文。
记得在过去校园风行写诗的时候，曾在老二的课本上看见过：
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 丝婚-两个人的结婚酒
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 戴上戒指后的第四年，左手无名指已经长出一圈浅浅滑滑的凹痕，总会习惯性地不时用拇指去摸它。 每次发现戒指不在了，马上会去找到并戴起来。因为，你的手上戴着另外一只。 第四年对彼此的了解，比两年前杀人游戏的默契
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 老二与作业
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 老二说话言简意赅，有时候很讨厌，但大多数时候却是很讨人喜欢。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: “重婚”赌城
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 今年很重要的一个指标就是“重婚”：三年之痒后我们打算再结一次重燃爱火。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: Note on a Few Defects
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: These days I have been working on some coding stuff, and was stuck in some stupid, yet interesting defects.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 去了三番
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
一个月前趁着独立日的档期，混到三番乱游了几天。

第一感觉就是乱。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 去了拱门国家公园
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 趁着Momenrial Day有一天假期，外加周末两天，我们蹭了同事的车一路往南杀到了犹他州的拱门国家公园(Arches National Park)。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: Asymptotic Notation
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
One of my reading projects is to work on the Introduction to Algorithm.

After a few chapters I realized that I might have already forgot all little pieces of mathematics learned in college.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 看了《叶问2》
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 五一最后一天去看了《叶问2》。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 老二陪逛街经验谈
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
周末出门，偶尔会碰到老二的老婆出街溜老公。
老二倒似很享受出来放风逛街的过程。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 史上最强的臭豆腐广告语
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
@中国上海张江地铁站

臭豆腐摊
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 09总结
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
那日和朋友聊到最近的改变，他说，好好加油吧，我就等着看你的年度总结了。

有点吓到我：原来还有人预订总结的。好吧，过了09就总。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 老二上厕所
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
老二上厕所。

推开门：靠……前面的家伙没有冲水！
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 从“如何成为一名程序员”看到的
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 皮婚 - 我的老妻
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: “三”对中国人来说是个很重要的数字，三年纪念日也是我们婚姻生活的一个里程碑。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 老二说成语-人无远虑必有近忧
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 人无远虑，必有近忧。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 老二的时间观
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 为什么年轻时候度日如年，而现今感觉刚过了一个礼拜，年关又到了？
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 生命的三维
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 五一起了个早，世界很清静。面对镜子刷牙时想：每个人的生命应该是个长方体吧。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 老二赏花
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
春天又来了。

窗角常春藤正绿，路边樱花正粉，还有到处放肆乱开的未名花正红正黄。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 新工作月末小记
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 按不折腾元年预告，2月进入了新的公司工作。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 也是关于爱情
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 读了朋友关于爱情的“随记瞬间”，不是很懂。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: Farewell HP
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
In the past two months when I read a farewell letter, I felt sad because a friend left us.
Now I am writing this mail and I know, today it turns to me.
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 不折腾元年预告
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 1月 春节。百年难遇的14个节假日
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 软柿子好捏
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 每天都在地铁上偷窥美眉手中的时代报，今天看到一篇《上海市人大代表薄海豹提请地方立法禁止地铁行为艺术》。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 08总结
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 新年第一天，饶有兴致地看罢05、06、07年的总结。趁热打铁，赶紧的赶紧的把去年的所作所为记录一下。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 布婚
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 纸婚刚过去一年，而看似遥远的布婚纪念日却也转眼间变成一个月以前的事了。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 杂想
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 宁向冠希学英文 莫谈国事
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 07年总结
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
05年底，在屯特Macandra小屋里隔着玻璃和薄雪看烟花，打开小音箱听TEARS OVER
SHETLAND，整个晚上慢慢回顾，静静敲下那年的总结。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 新世纪啥最贵
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 二十一世纪，啥最贵？人才已经不贵了，满街的人才不都找不到工作吗，满公司的人才不都像狗一样奔命吗；房子车子也不算贵了，猪肉青菜方便面都通通升值了，那人家一平卖个两三万也不过分了。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 纪念日
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 我们39个月相识纪念日刚过去，今天即是私自订婚25个月纪念日，随后9个月结婚纪念日也要到来。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 都说
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 都说天网恢恢疏而不漏。 其实漏网之鱼总是有的，只是没有一条会傻到跳出来大喊“嘿，你瞧我这不就漏啦”。 都说纸包不住火。 其实包住火的纸还是有的，只是太严实了，从来没人知道里头有啥。 都说成功者都是偏执狂。 其实
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 没有题目
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 在一些时候我应该很笨很笨，笨且固执。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 人生如戏
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 那天看到创创哥哥的签名：人生不过是死前的游戏，好好享受吧。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 06总结
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 2006年悄悄地结束，就在两分钟前洗澡的时候才知道07已经开始。照例，年度总结。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 开始吧
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 睡觉睡到自然醒取钱取到手抽筋的生活，下周终于可以结束。取而代之的是打工者的身份开始日复一日的简单且劳累的24小时。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 睡醒了，还没死
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 醒来发现，还没死。于是起床，于是洗漱，于是买菜，于是继续找工作。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 回家
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description:
一个半小时：哥本哈根

十一个半小时：上海

三个小时：海口

回家了。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 毕业了……
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 七月四日，美国独立了，我毕业了。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 老二想不通的事
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 老二三十好几，为人忠厚。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 一些事
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 人不是随着时间的推移，而是由经历的堆积，而慢慢长大的。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 虚伪的灵魂
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 两个正在等待重生的灵魂偶遇。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 忽然间很忙……
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 忽然间很忙起来。
item.dc:creator: Justin

item.title: 又是一年
item.author: justin.y.huang@live.com (Justin)
item.description: 一个人在地球另一边看月亮已经一年有余，再次呆坐在小屋里望着窗外欢快的烟火，感叹生命不过如此。
item.dc:creator: Justin
